text: 36:21 Jeremaia 25:11; 29:10Israelia fomɨra uan nguazimɨn ikia, egha 7plan azenibar vaghvagha dar aven azenir vamɨra avughsazim nguazim ganɨngizir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God faragha Jeremaian akam garugha mɨkemezir akam, guizbangɨram otivasa, Israelia ghua 70plan azenibar Babilonɨn kalabuziabar mɨn iti. Ezɨ men nguazim puram avughsa iti.36:21 Nɨ Ofa Gami 26:33-35, ko Jeremaia 25:11 ko 29:10ɨn gan.
